name: @aws/glide-for-redis

scripts.build: npm run build-internal && npm run build-protobuf && npm run build-external
scripts.build:release: npm run build-internal:release && npm run build-protobuf && npm run build-external:release
scripts.build:benchmark: npm run build-internal:benchmark && npm run build-protobuf && npm run build-external
scripts.build-external: rm -rf build-ts && tsc -p tsconfig-mjs.json && tsc -p tsconfig-cjs.json &&  ./fixup_pj_files_for_build_type
scripts.build-external:release: rm -rf build-ts && tsc -p tsconfig-mjs.json && tsc -p tsconfig-cjs.json &&  ./fixup_pj_files_for_build_type --stripInternal
scripts.build-protobuf: npm run compile-protobuf-files && npm run fix-protobuf-file
scripts.compile-protobuf-files: cd src && pbjs -t static-module -o ProtobufMessage.js ../../glide-core/src/protobuf/*.proto && pbts -o ProtobufMessage.d.ts ProtobufMessage.js
scripts.fix-protobuf-file: replace 'this\.encode\(message, writer\)\.ldelim' 'this.encode(message, writer && writer.len ? writer.fork() : writer).ldelim' src/ProtobufMessage.js

author: Amazon Web Services
